name: Oppai Puzzle
description:
This is a classic digital jigsaw puzzle that anyone can easily play.

Since it is a digital jigsaw puzzle, The player has plenty of space and is able to automatically save the Jigsaw's progress at any Time.

When you have completed the puzzle, you can always check out the exquisite Cg.

A lot of convenient functions for completing the puzzle, such as the auto save function.Features:
  • Dozens of exquisite puzzles
  • Relaxing music
  • Auto-save function
  • Traditional jigsaw puzzle that you can easily play
